title: Denver child transported to hospital with gunshot wound
content:
A young child was transported to the hospital just before noon in Denver with an apparent gunshot wound.
The Denver Police Department said on Twitter that the child’s condition is unknown.
Other details are not yet available.
This story will update as more information becomes available.
Yesenia Robles: 303-954-1372, yrobles@denverpost.com or @yeseniarobles
